Question 1

Write a function for RMSE

title: ST558 Homework 4
text:
Question 2

Create response and prediction values

set.seed(10)
n <- 100
x <- runif(n)
resp <- 3 + 10*x + rnorm(n)
pred <- predict(lm(resp ~ x), data.frame(x))



Test RMSE function


Repeat with missing values
